case.title: BBW Gatwick seeks... - 34 (Gatwick)
case.text:
Hi! 34 years old, 5'8, size 22/24, dark hair, dark eyes and spec wearing seeks laughs and other fun stuff with a man of no particular age or race but of height. I have a job that takes up a lot of my time and have little opportunity to 'meet' men.
Not after NSA nor am I looking for naked pics so please don't waste your time or energy!
Grab my attention if you dare...
